Articles.Content:
True, sometimes I have to click "check for updates" just to make sure.

The next user plays way too much KSP.

True, you have to if you dream about it.

The user below me likes cheese.

True.

The next user is being/has been turned into a cat by Chobit.

false.

The user below me has touched their tongue to their nose before.

No. Never could do it.

The user below me has seen the movie Moon.

What movie? (Errr... false.)

The next user below is not above me.

True.

The user below me is a user below me.

False I'm above you, on a map at the very least.

The user below me will not have posted on this game before

False.

The user below me is located north of the Equator.

Yes, and so do you.

The next user is less than 2 days ahead of or behind me.

True(You are referring to post time, right?)

The user below me plays or has played Sim City 4.

False.

The next user plays minecraft.

False.

True(You are referring to post time, right?)

Nope, referencing to time zones (PDT times in comparison to other times)

The next user is above me. (Post decides.)

True, I am above you as well as below you. I am the bread, and you are the sandwich.

The next user wants to eat a sandwich now.

Yes, A sammich sounds nice.

The user below me prefers sammiches to sandwitches

True. I dislike sandy witches.

The user below me is above me yet below me.

Yes, for I am above all as I float in my Kerbol station @ 136 Gm.

The next user agrees with me that Kerbol stations are actually quite useless.

False, everything has a use, you just have to find it.

The user below me drinks tea

True, I enjoy a good cup of tea every now and then.

The next user has been to a Starbucks.

True. I work at a starbucks.

The user below me has a life outside the internet.

False. I used to, but then the government wouldn't let me near aircraft anymore...

The user below me has aviation experience

True, if you count working at a cafe at a local airfield

The user below me can speak spanish

Nope. I only speak english.

The user below me knows what my avatar picture as-of-now is.

False.

The user below is doing somthing important.

False, I'm almost never doing important things.

The user below me is an Europan.
